ComicInfo.Title: 100 Dragons
ComicInfo.Summary: The demented dictator called Absinthe turns up the heat on Cole Blaquesmith, sending the mysterious mercenary Victoria to bring him in, but can Absinthe be trusted even by his own minions? Not likely! Meanwhile, Cole discovers just how long he's been "sleeping" and starts to put together pieces of his fragmented memories, but will he decipher this strange world before Vicki tears his head off? Also, who is the Iron Monk, and what does he want with the limbic glands of London's underdwellers?
